text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's it over there. That island is home to the Mejiro Family's villa.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That island's full of villas! You know what that means, we can dig up some treasure under there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please do not destroy the island!
The members of Team Sirius decided to host a training camp during their summer vacation.
Since it was for the team, Mejiro McQueen allowed us to use the Mejiro Family's villa. However…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yahoo!! This island's entirely deserted! Now we can have as much fun as we want!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Jeez, we didn't come here to mess around you know.
I guess she can't help but get excited…
choice_data_list: Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.
Since it's the first day, let's just take it easy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… Trainer-san, even you're saying things like that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hey, is it really okay for us to have come along? We aren't a part of your team after all…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen and Trainer-san invited us, so it won't be a problem!
I figured it would be more fun if more people tagged along, so you're both more than welcome.
I figured it would be more fun if more people tagged along, so you're both more than welcome.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!
And thus began the start of Team Sirius' training camp, including two members of the Mejiro Family.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone, let's do one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen, if you don't pick up the pace I'm going to overtake you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh!? It's my job to lead the way though!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hey now, Dober, you need to pick up the pace too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: B-But I can't really focus on running right now… everyone's staring…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Dober, there's nothing to worry about! You're really cute after all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: P-Please don't try and compliment me! I know better than anyone else that I'm not cute!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Gold Ship-san! What on Earth are you doing!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: When training at the beach you've gotta dress the part, doncha think?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: We don't often get to train at the beach so this is the perfect time for some intense training!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All I can see is that you're trying to do some intense playing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: All right, it's time for me to accelerate!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: W-Wait up! You're running too fast!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… Haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I think we may have gone a bit too hard. It is only the first day after all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That being said, McQueen is truly amazing, isn't she? She managed to keep up with your sudden spurt easily.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I can't lose to Ryan again. She already beat me in the Takarazuka Kinen after all.
For context, prior to this summer camp Mejiro McQueen came into the Takarazuka Kinen, the race that closes off the first half of the year, as the most likely to win.
However, she was unable to fend off Mejiro Ryan and ended up coming in second.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: McQueen's running never ceases to amaze me! Whether it be during training or during races!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Well she is the reason we joined this team～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ugh… How long is this going to last?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: There's a reason that they love you so much. It's something you can be proud of, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That's right, you're truly incredible. It makes me so happy when people praise you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Okay then, I'm going to go for another run so I can make sure to defeat the super popular McQueen once again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, don't go on without me! I'm going for a run too!
The sun began to set, and that's when we realized just how late it had gotten. Time truly flies when one is having fun.
Is everything alright? Everyone's already headed back to the villa.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah… I'm fine. I was just thinking about our team's members.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just a little while ago we were a shell of our former selves, but now we have new members.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: They all saw how I ran, and that made them want to run alongside me.
They were all moved by you. Just like we were moved by Oguri's race.
They were all moved by you. Just like we were moved by Oguri's race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: When I think about it I get mixed feelings. On one hand I'm incredibly proud, but on the other hand it's quite embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We were able to win the Spring Tenno Sho and preserve the team, however…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, there is still something that I need to do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I need to continue running so as not to betray the expectations that everyone else has of me.
The expression on Mejiro McQueen's face, which was smiling yet exuding confidence, reassured me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course, you can count on me.
